summary: A configuration holder that aggregates separate encoder and decoder settings to define a vision‑encoder‑text‑decoder model, managing their combined parameters and enabling easy initialization, saving and loading of the multimodal architecture.
business_intent: Allow developers to quickly configure and instantiate multimodal models that encode visual inputs and generate textual outputs, supporting applications such as image captioning, visual question answering, and other vision‑to‑language tasks.
